about.title: About Me
about.text1: Hi, I’m Noa. I’m a video editor who has been living and breathing this craft for over a decade. For me, it’s so much more than a profession—it’s a passion, a hobby, and truly from the heart. Every couple brings their own world with unique colors, tones, rhythm, and melody. It’s a great privilege for me to be there with you on the most important day of your life.
